cause.description:
The future of Internet radio is in immediate danger. Royalty rates for webcasters have been drastically increased by a recent ruling and are due to go into effect on July 15 (retroactive to Jan 1, 2006!). If the increased rates remain unchanged, the majority of webcasters will go bankrupt and silent on this date. Internet radio needs your help! The Internet Radio Equality Act has recently been introduced in both the House (H.R. 2060) and Senate (S. 1353) to save the Internet radio industry. Please call your senators and your representative to ask them to co-sponsor the Internet Radio Equality Act! For more information on how to contact your local representatives visit: http://www.savenetradio.org/
1. Fight unfair internet radio royalty increases
2. Pass the House bill H.R.2060
3. Pass the Senate bill S. 1353
cause.mission: Help pass the The Internet Radio Equality Act to save internet radio from extinction.
cause.name: Save Internet Radio
